Package notifications

Class NotificationRowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • notifications.NotificationRowController
  • public class NotificationRowController
extends java.lang.Object
    used to control a single row of a notification, controls the NotificationRow FXML file
    Author:
    Eitan

      (package private) void notificationAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      when the Mark As Read button is pressed the notification moves to the second tab the notification changes it status as read if a notification is already marked as read, a delete button appears which deletes the notification from the DB
